title: OCE Tribunal
body:
So my question is not where is it. Because I know that Rito are working on revamping the tribunal globally but the last news on this was about a year ago for me. Does anyone know if there has been anymore news or info on this since thier post.

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/player-behavior/tribunal-oce

replies.body:
The Instant Feedback system was enabled last Friday.

You can read about it here: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/player-behavior/new-player-reform-system-heads-testing

The Player Behaviour team are launching features as they finish. One of the features that just came out with the updated system is reform cards, which you may remember from the old Tribunal.
Sephyre this is exactly what I was curious about. Thankyou very much for responding so quickly and thoroughly. Appreciate the love RITO!
